cy: Beth dych chi'n wisgo heddiw?
en: What are you wearing today?

cy: Pa ddillad dych chi'n wisgo yn y gaeaf?
en: What clothes do you wear in winter?

cy: Ydych chi'n hoffi dillad syml neu fwy lliwgar neu gymhleth?
en: Do you like simple clothes or ones that are more colourful or complex?

cy: Beth yw eich barn chi am esgidiau â sodlau uchel?
en: What is your opinion on high-heeled shoes?

cy: Pa fath o esgidiau wyt ti’n hoffi?
en: What kind of shoes do you like?

cy: Wyt ti'n hoffi siopa am ddillad?
en: Do you like shopping for clothes?

cy: Ydych chi'n gwisgo unrhywbeth arbennig heddiw?
en: Are you wearing anything special today?

cy: Beth dych chi'n wisgo i'r gwaith?
en: What do you wear to work?

cy: Oes well gyda chi dillad ffurfiol neu anffurfiol?
en: Do you prefer formal or informal clothes?

cy: Oes hoff ddarn o ddillad gennych chi?
en: Do you have a favourite item of clothing?

cy: Ydych chi'n siopa am ddillad ar-lein o gwbl?
en: Do you ever shop for clothes online?

cy: Beth yw eich barn chi am fenig?
en: What's your opinion on gloves?

cy: Beth yw eich barn chi am brynu dillad ail-law?
en: What's your opinion on buying second-hand clothes?

cy: Ydych chi’n gwisgo dillad lliwgar?
en: Do you wear colourful clothes?

cy: Pa liw yw eich hoff liw?
en: What colour is your favourite colour?

cy: Oes well gyda chi lliwiau llachar neu dywyll?
en: Do you prefer bright or dark colours?

cy: Pa liw yw eich llygaid?
en: What colour are your eyes?

cy: Oes yna liw nad ydych chi'n ei hoffi?
en: Is there a colour you don't like?

cy: Pa liw yw'r awyr heddiw?
en: What colour is the sky today?

cy: Beth oedd lliw eich ystafell gwely pan oeddech chi'n ifanc?
en: What colour was your bedroom when you were younger?

cy: Pa liw yw eich gwallt?
en: What colour is your hair?

cy: Pa liw dillad dych chi'n gwisgo heddiw?
en: What colour clothes are you wearing today?

cy: Oes well gyda chi ystafelloedd lliwgar neu syml?
en: Do you prefer colourful or simple rooms/interiors?

cy: Pa liw yw eich tŷ?
en: What colour is your house?

cy: Pa liw blodau dych chi'n hoffi?
en: What colour flowers do you like?

cy: Ydych chi'n meddwl bod lliwiau'n bwysig?
en: Do you think colours are important?

cy: Pa wlad wyt ti eisiau ymweld â hi?
en: Which country do you want to visit?

cy: Pa wlad ydych chi wedi ymweld â hi y mwyaf?
en: Which country have you visited the most?

cy: Beth yw'r pellaf dych chi wedi teithio?
en: What's the furthest you have travelled?

cy: Beth yw eich hoff beth am deithio i wlad dramor?
en: What's your favourite thing about travelling to a foreign country?

cy: Dych chi'n hoffi teithio ar eich pen eich hun?
en: Do you like travelling alone?

cy: Dych chi wedi bod i Ffrainc?
en: Have you been to France?

cy: O ba wlad dych chi'n dod?
en: What country do you come from?

cy: Dych chi wedi byw mewn gwlad arall?
en: Have you lived in another country?

cy: Pa wlad yw eich ffefryn?
en: What country is your favourite?

cy: Ble aethoch chi ar eich gwyliau diwethaf?
en: Where did you go on your last holiday?

cy: Dych chi'n siarad ieithoedd eraill?
en: Do you speak other languages?

cy: Beth yw'r anfanteision o deithio yn eich barn chi?
en: What are the disadvantages of travelling, in your opinion?

cy: Sut dych chi'n hoffi teithio?
en: How do you like to travel?

cy: Dych chi'n cymryd cawod yn y bore neu'r nos?
en: Do you take a shower in the morning or evening?

cy: Pryd dych chi'n mynd i'r gwely?
en: When do you go to bed?

cy: Dych chi'n gwylio'r newyddion bob dydd?
en: Do you watch the news every day?

cy: Beth yw'r peth cyntaf dych chi'n wneud yn y bore?
en: What's the first thing you do in the morning?

cy: Beth dych chi'n wneud ar ôl yr ysgol/gwaith?
en: What do you do after school/work?

cy: Dych chi'n gwneud ymarfer corff yn rheolaidd?
en: Do you exercise regularly?

cy: Pryd dych chi'n codi yn y bore?
en: When do you get up in the morning?

cy: Beth dych chi'n fwyta i frecwast?
en: What do you eat for breakfast?

cy: Ydych chi fel arfer yn prynu cinio neu'n dod â chinio o adref?
en: Do you usually buy lunch or bring it from home?

cy: Sut ydych chi'n teithio i'r ysgol/gwaith?
en: How do you travel to school/work?

cy: Oes yna rywbeth arbennig dych chi'n ceisio gwneud o leiaf unwaith bob dydd?
en: Is there something special you try to do at least once a day?

cy: Beth yw eich hoff ran o'r diwrnod, a pham?
en: What is your favourite part of the day, and why?

cy: Oes well gyda chi cael strwythyr pendant yn y dydd neu'r rhyddid i wneud pethau gwahanol?
en: Do you prefer having a specific structure to your day or the freedom to do different things?

cy: Sawl person sydd yn eich teulu chi?
en: How many people are in your family?

cy: Oes gyda chi brodyr neu chwiorydd?
en: Do you have any brothers or sisters?

cy: Oes anifeiliaid anwes gyda chi?
en: Do you have pets?

cy: Dych chi'n byw yn agos at eich teulu?
en: Do you live close by to your family?

cy: Oes nain a thaid gyda chi?
en: Do you have grandparents?

cy: Pa fath o swydd sydd gyda'ch rhieni?
en: What kinds of jobs do your parents have?

cy: Pa lysiau dych chi'n hoffi?
en: What vegetables do you like?

cy: Dych chi'n mynd mas i fwyta yn aml?
en: Do you go out to eat often?

cy: Ydy bwyta brecwast yn bwysig i chi?
en: Is eating breakfast important to you?

cy: Dych chi'n bwyta cig?
en: Do you eat meat?

cy: Dych chi'n hoffi siocled?
en: Do you like chocolate?

cy: Ydych chi'n yfed coffi? Beth yw eich barn chi amdano?
en: Do you drink coffee? What's your opninion on it?

cy: Dych chi'n gallu coginio?
en: Can you cook?

cy: Beth dych chi'n yfed gyda'ch bwyd?
en: What do you drink with your food?

cy: Beth yw eich hoff fwyd?
en: What is your favourite food?

cy: Dych chi'n hoffi bwyd â sbeis?
en: Do you like spicy food?

cy: Beth wyt ydych chi'n cael i frecwast fel arfer?
en: What do you usually have for breakfast?

cy: Oes well gyda chi coffi, te, neu siocled poeth?
en: Do you prefer coffee, tea or hot chocolate?

cy: Pa fath o fwyd ydych chi _ddim_ yn hoffi?
en: What kind of food do you dislike?

cy: Ydych chi'n darllen yn eich amser sbâr?
en: Do you read in your spare time?

cy: Wyt ti'n chwarae unrhyw chwaraeon?
en: Do you play any sports?

cy: Beth wyt ti'n hoffi gwneud yn dy amser hamdden?
en: What do you like to do in your free time?

cy: Dych chi'n hoffi garddio?
en: Do you like gardening?

cy: Beth dych chi'n gwneud ar y penwythnos?
en: What do you do at the weekend?

cy: Pa fath o gerddoriaeth dych chi'n hoffi gwrando arno?
en: What kind of music do you like?

cy: Oes yna hobi hoffech chi ddechrau?
en: Is there a hobby you would like to start?

cy: Oes hobi arbennig gyda chi?
en: Do you have a special hobby?

cy: Dych chi'n hoffi coginio?
en: Do you like cooking?

cy: Pa raglenni teledu dych chi'n hoffi?
en: What TV programmes do you like?

cy: Dych chi'n mynd i'r sinema'n aml?
en: Do you go to the cinema often?

cy: Dych chi'n hoffi chwaraeon?
en: Do you like sports?

cy: Ydych chi'n chwarae offeryn? Os na, oes offeryn hoffech chi allu chwarae?
en: Do you play an instrument? If not, is there an instrument you'd like to be able to play?

cy: Beth yw eich enw chi?
en: What’s your name?

cy: O ble dych chi'n dod?
en: Where do you come from?

cy: Sut byddech chi'n disgrifio'ch hun mewn 3 gair?
en: How would you describe yourself in 3 words?

cy: Faint yw eich oed chi?
en: How old are you?

cy: Ble dych chi'n byw?
en: Where do you live?

cy: Beth yw eich gwaith chi?
en: What is your job?

cy: Pam ydych chi'n dysgu Cymraeg?
en: Why are you learning Welsh?

cy: Oes unrhyw sgiliau arbennig gyda chi?
en: Do you have any special skills?

cy: Beth yw eich arwydd sidydd (zodiac sign)?
en: What is your zodiac sign?

cy: Pryd mae eich pen-blwydd?
en: When is your birthday?

cy: Am faint o'r gloch ydych chi'n codi yn y bore?
en: When do you wake up in the morning?

cy: Am faint o'r gloch ydych chi'n cael swper fel arfer?
en: When do you usually have dinner/supper?

cy: Pa oed fyddwch chi flwyddyn nesaf?
en: What age will you be next year?

cy: Pa rif yw eich ffefryn?
en: What number is your favourite?

cy: Beth ydy hanner pedwar deg?
en: What is half of forty?

cy: Faint o funudau sydd mewn dwy awr?
en: How many minutes are in two hours?

cy: Beth yw'r flwyddyn eleni?
en: What year is it?

cy: Beth yw 25% fel ffracsiwn?
en: What is 25% as a fraction??

cy: Faint yw dau ddeg lluosi pump?
en: What is twenty times five?

cy: Beth yw pump deg dau wedi'i adio at saith deg naw?
en: What is fifty-two added to seventy-nine?

cy: Beth yw'r dyddiad heddiw?
en: What is the date today?

cy: Os mae afal ar werth am bump deg ceiniog yr un, faint byddai'n costio i brynu deg ohonyn nhw?
en: If an apple is on sale for 50p each, how much would it cost to buy ten of them?

cy: Elli di gyfri o un i ddeg?
en: Can you count from one to ten?

cy: Oes siop lyfrau yn dy dref?
en: Is there a bookshop in your town?

cy: Ble yw'r lle agosaf lle gallwn i brynu bara?
en: Where is the closest place I could buy bread?

cy: Ydy'r post yn agos?
en: Is the post office near?

cy: Oes sinema yn y dref?
en: Is there a cinema in town?

cy: Ble mae'r orsaf drenau?
en: Where is the train station?

cy: Dych chi'n gwybod ble mae'r llyfrgell?
en: Do you know where the library is?

cy: Ble mae'r banc?
en: Where is the bank?

cy: Pa mor bell yw'r ganolfan siopa?
en: How far is the shopping centre?

cy: Ble mae’r siop fwyaf?
en: Where is the biggest shop?

cy: Wyt ti’n hoffi mynd i’r parc?
en: Do you go like going to the park?

cy: Oes caffi da yma?
en: Is there a good café here?

cy: Sut mae'r tywydd fel arfer ble rydych chi'n byw?
en: What's the weather usually like where you live?

cy: Oes well gyda ti byw ble mae'n boeth neu ble mae'n oer?
en: Do you prefer living somewhere hot or somewhere cold?

cy: Sut mae'r tywydd heddiw yn eich ardal chi?
en: How's the weather today where you are?

cy: Pryd mae hi'n bwrw glaw fel arfer?
en: When does it usually rain?

cy: Ydych chi'n hoffi mynd unrhywle yn arbennig pan mae'n heulog?
en: Do you like going anywhere in particular when it's sunny??

cy: Pa fath o dywydd dych chi'n hoffi mwyaf?
en: What kind of weather do you like the most?

cy: Beth ydych chi'n hoffi gwneud pan mae'n bwrw glaw?
en: What do you like to do when it's raining?

cy: Beth ydych chi'n hoffi gwneud pan mae'n bwrw eira?
en: What do you like to do when it's snowing?

cy: Ydych chi erioed wedi bod mewn sefyllfa o dywydd eithafol (extreme weather), fel mewn storm neu lifog (flood)?
en: Have you ever been in a situation with extreme weather, like in a storm or flood?

cy: Pa dymor yw dy ffefryn: gaeaf, gwanwyn, haf, neu hydref?
en: Which is your favourite season: winter, spring, summer or autumn?
